item.title: Regarding the NIKKE Piece
item.description: A short while ago I wrote a first impressions piece on the recently-released mobile game Goddess of Victory: NIKKE, where I blasted it for largely being “just another JRPG focused on DPS checks” rather than actually taking advantage of its core mechanical premise of being a Time Crisis-esque cover shooter. This involved a rundown of some of the game’s core mechanics that was, to put it mildly, extremely fucking wrong.
